metadata.title: CVE-2020-7981 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - untriaged
metadata.description:
sql.rb in Geocoder before 1.6.1 allows Boolean-based SQL injection whenwithin_bounding_box is used in conjunction with untrusted sw_lat, sw_lng,ne_lat, or ne_lng data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-geocoder - 1.5.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-geocoder package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.1-3').
